General.Name: Boostheat
General.Description: Boostheat SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design and development of thermal compressor in France, Germany and Switzerland. It offers heat pump with thermal compressors. Boostheat SA was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Venissieux, France.

3.Name: Ms. Sabrina  Ferre
3.Title: Head of Communications & Investor Relations and Exec. Assistant
